## Problem Statement

A clear and concise description of the problem this feature would solve. Is there something that SIMILAR currently cannot do that should be able to do?

## Proposed Solution

A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Include:

- The new functionality or behavior
- How it would be used (API design)
- Expected benefits

## Alternative Solutions

A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Component

Which SIMILAR component would this feature affect?

- [ ] Similar2Logo (Python DSL)
- [ ] C++ Engine
- [ ] Java Libraries
- [ ] JamFree (Traffic simulation)
- [ ] Web Interface
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Build System

If you have thoughts on implementation:

- Technical approach
- Breaking changes required
- Dependencies needed
- Performance considerations
